description:
Mayorati, Not Maserati is http://anidb.net/ch1167 [Hijikata Toushirou]`s guardian spirit, the spirit of a rich man`s Maserati he ruined by pouring mayonnaise in its tank as a prank back when he was a bad boy. Due to that, he was put under the "Mayorati" curse, meaning he has to intake mayonnaise at regular intervals.
He was also put under the "V-Shaped Bangs" curse, meaning his bangs are always pulled by a Maserati, putting him at risk of balding.
Source: Crunchyroll
name: Maserati Ja Nee Mayorati Da
